definition: dialect/language/spoken words/speech/talk/words/conversation/what sb said/CL:種|种[zhong3],席[xi2],句[ju4],口[kou3],番[fan1]

sentences.english: Hui hai behaved calm after listen to, but also to his nephew and general manager of MingWei lectured.
sentences.chinese: 匯海聽後表現鎮定，還向其侄兒兼總經理明威訓話。

sentences.english: Can you remember the most inspiring team-talks this season?
sentences.chinese: 你還記得本賽季最激動人心的球隊訓話嗎？

sentences.english: Onto a high-voltage line, rebuke a row of apartments.
sentences.chinese: 飛到高壓線上，衝着一排公寓訓話。

sentences.english: The process included a team-talk with Didier Deschamps.
sentences.chinese: 這其中包括主教練德尚的一次全隊訓話。

definition: Zhou Ji (1781-1839), Qing writer and poet
help to the needy/emergency relief/charity/to give to poorer relative/(also 賙濟|赒济)
to beat sb at their own game (idiom)
lit. to fall behind Sun Shan 孫山|孙山[Sun1 Shan1] (who came last in the imperial examination) (idiom)/fig. to fail an exam/to fall behind (in a competition)
no strategy left to try (idiom); at one's wit's end/at the end of one's tether/powerless
to stand guard/to serve on sentry duty
junior high school (Tw)/abbr. to 國中|国中[guo2 zhong1]
gongs and drums overture to a Chinese opera/to create a disturbance
internal affairs/domestic affairs/family affairs/(trad.) affairs within the palace
